help.commands: add group,add exp,remove exp,remove group,list group,list exp,cls,exit
help.cmd_add.exp: Add a new Regular Expression to an existing group
help.cmd_remove.group: Remove an existing Group from the Regex Groups
help.cmd_remove.exp: Remive an existing Expression from a group
help.cmd_list.exp: List the expressions of an existing group

p_Group.Name.values: Any valid regex group name,|,In case of creating a group any valid string that doesn't contains spaces

help.p_Group.Name: Defines a valid name for Regex groups for referencing, creating
